Headline: #72 North Temporary Westbound Reroute near North Avenue/Laramie
ShortDescription: WB 72 North buses are temp. rerouted via North Avenue, Laramie, Division, Central and North Avenue: due to, fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Laramie, Division, Central and North Avenue: due to, fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kimball/Fullerton

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Diversey, Central Park, Fullerton, Kimball and over regular route, due to street blockage near Kimball/Fullerton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute near Lawrence Red Line
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses temp. rrtd EB: Broadway, Foster, Lake Shore Dr, Wilson & Marine Dr; WB: Marine Dr, Lawrence, Lake Shore Dr, Foster, Broadway & Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to fire department activity near Lawrence Red Line.

Eastbound buses will operate via Broadway, Foster, Lake Shore Drive, Wilson and Marine Drive.

Westbound buses will operate via Marine Drive, Lawrence, Lake Shore Drive, Foster, Broadway, then resume their normal route on Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Bryn Mawr. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Bryn Mawr.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
